title: Orientation Program for Online Learning Success

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Environment where learners require flexible schedules while balancing work; smartphone-centric LMS access and project-based assessments are needed to sustain engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can independently manage course materials and assignments by utilizing basic LMS functionalities.
Learners can practice self-directed time management by creating and executing weekly study plans.
Learners can build a collaborative network with peer learners using online discussion boards and communication tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
